website_summaries.verdict: A nice little train for young children who are obsessed with trains, but aren't ready to put tracks together.
pros: Has a little bit more width than some other trains, but still does not take up a lot of space
Safe and Eco-friendly like the other Green Toys
cons: Has 6 total parts, which can easily become separated
Cars can come apart during play

customer_reviews.title: ... when I saw this giant one I knew he'd love it! Being able to fit lots of his ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old is obsessed with trains and when I saw this giant one I knew he'd love it! Being able to fit lots of his toys inside for a train ride? Heck yes. Sure enough on Christmas morning it was his favorite toy! He plays with it a lot. I love the simple, bright colors and how sturdy it is! This thing is not going to break!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy toy train
customer_reviews.text: This is such a well made, sturdy toy train. It's actually made from recycled plastic. There is no metal or small pieces. My toddler loves putting the train cars together and then putting his Sesame Street characters in to push around the house on a ride. Keeps him entertained for hours. Oh and bonus: it's also dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: RRNMCW

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy train
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome toy. No buttons means hours of imaginative play time! It's the perfect size for a toddler. It's the perfect toy for a child who loves trains, but isn't old enough to put a track together, or would be frustrated by a track. Very sturdy. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sevilla

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit for a OCC shoebox gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go in my Operation Christmas Child Shoebox (a program for needy children in other countries). It is well made and very adorable. It does fit in the shoebox but leaves little room for any other items. I am sure I can get a washcloth, bar of soap, toothbrush and a box of crayons in but not much else. I will look for a bigger shoebox so the train and more items (like a coloring book and a ball) can fit. Just wanted to let other OCC folks know its adorable but needs a bigger box.
customer_reviews.author: KC's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toy and product!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most awesome and coolest toys ever! They are so sturdy and well made, it is hard to believe they’re made from recycled materials and in the USA!!! They’re such a great size and so fairly priced. Our 2.5 year old absolutely loves them and they’ve all withstood him throwing them, crashing them, leaving outside in the weather, thrown down basement stairs, etc. Never tarnished, broken, molded or anything! Great company and toy! Highly recommend for all toddlers and kids as these won’t be quickly outgrown. Also love that they have colors for all kids to enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Sara B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful train!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my 2-year old son who loves trains. This is now his favorite. You’ll never go wrong with Green Toys! We own several and this is the latest. Aside from the cool design, this train is wonderfully made as expected. Safe and clean plastic, no sharp edges or protruding parts that can harm he little ones.
customer_reviews.author: SkywalkerTwin

customer_reviews.title: Durable, fun toy- great train for play time.
customer_reviews.text: Green Toys always seem to be high quality and durable for our energetic toddler. They can be tossed around and still hold up well. This train is no exception and our little one has enjoyed going around the house shouting "choo chooo" while running this on the floor. It's easy enough for a young one to hook the train cars together and light enough to carry it all around to a play spot. The sizing is perfect for little hands and is just all around a fun toy. We've paired this withbook for reading time while looking at the toy as well. Has been fun for reading time and play time.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt stay together
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love it but my 2 year old hot very frustrated with it falling apart, because he doesn't like to leave it on the floor, when he tries to pick it up the roof or different sections fall apart. It's good quality thick plastic though!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle12

customer_reviews.title: Green "Recycle" Toys...Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's great that these toys from Green Toys are made from recycling. My son loves trains, so this was a big hit for him. It's a right size for young kids to play with. I would like to suggest a couple of things to the manufacturer: 1) Have some kind of secure device between the engine and the cars so that when the train is being pulled or pushed that they do split apart 2) Have the roof of one the car to stay in place because it comes quite often when my son is playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: John Lee

customer_reviews.title: The best! And you can wash it :)
customer_reviews.text: Our son has severe allergies and eczema so we wanted a toy that could be regularly washed and bleached especially after other kids play with it. This toy does the trick and has lasted through many washings. Our son loves playing with it too. It’s a simple toy but endless fun. We will be getting more toys from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best train toy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my 3 yr olds favorite toys! So cute. Easy to put together and take apart. Easy to clean. Durable and safe! Lead free! Made in the USA from recycled materials. I am starting to collect these toys for my son as they encourage imagination and free play! They do not make noise and aren't annoying! Win for parent and child!
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for money and will last long time
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th green toy I have purchased and am very pleased with the train for my 2 yr old grandson who is crazy about trains. It is the only train he has that he can hook the cars easily. He likes being able to take the top of one of the cars. We gave it to him for his birthday and it was his favorite thing he got. My grandson is rough with his toys but the green company products live up to their reputation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson who is obsessed with trains because he has other Green Toys that are great. It is an ok toy, but it has several parts which get separated in the toy baskets. That's not really the fault of the toy design, but it is to be expected given the nature of toddlers. As a result, he can't find all the parts and doesn't play with it much, preferring his other trains, such as the Thomas series.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE Green Toys products! They hold up, seriously. We've had some for years that look new still. I got this train for my toddler who HATES magnetic trains. He can actually put this together and drive it around. My only annoyance is the roof that comes off because the kids just ditch that and leave it places - minor problem to have ;) Highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Chantal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome train toy!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this toy for a few years now and it is holding up amazingly well. It has been an outside toy, bath toy, and seen some hard hauls through the gravel. Still looks new! Great toy for toddler/preschoolers. Impressive quality. Smooth, no sharp parts. Easy for littles to put together and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for this brand.
customer_reviews.text: This train set will annoy you!!! It doesn't stay together. Your child has to keep putting the train cars on tge hooks and the top of tge caboose also falls off easily. We have other toys by this brand and they're awesome, but this train is not.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, but be careful with the caboose!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute toy! This was a huge hit at Christmas (and still is). The colors are bright and bold, and the little bear characters fit in each cart. I would have liked the bears to have a little more detail, but they are exactly as pictured. The top of the caboose does detach, and but it doesn't fit back on securely. This caused some distress for my 2 year old who likes to put things back together as much as he likes taking them apart. Overall, it's a good buy, especially if you get a decent discount. I would have been a lot more frustrated about the caboose if I hadn't gotten this 50% off.
customer_reviews.author: MomSolo

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: We got this in 2018 and it’s nearly 2021 and our 4 year old still plays with it daily. It is like new still despite how rough he is with it. He loves it and has played with it a million ways. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Train For Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: No assembly is required, very sturdy and durable. Perfect size for little hands to push around the on the floor. Green Toys are made 100% from recycled products, dishwasher safe and made in the USA. Our 2 year old grandson loves his new train.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D

customer_reviews.title: Well built!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Great sturdy build. So far indestructible by our 1 yr old and 3 yr old. Fun to put together and take apart. Comes with 2 blue bears. When you connect the train, it doesnt fall off easily, which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great value and super durable
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. I originally saw them at Pottery Barn and was planning buying them there but decided to check Amazon. So glad I did! These were the same toy for 1/3 the price. Our local library also has a set in their children's area and they have held up great. They are super sturdy and durable. The top comes off of the caboose so my boys like to put things in it and drive around. We have 2 so they can attach more cars.
customer_reviews.author: LilacDreams

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: My almost-3-year-old loves this train! It is strong and durable. Only negative thing I have to say about it is that the carts do not click together so the train does not stay as a long train for long bc you always have to put the carts back together.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic toy train
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2.5 yr old son who is obsessed with trains. He calls this train "Thomas" of course. It is very sturdy, yet light weight. My son enjoys re-arranging the cars and put the little bears inside.
customer_reviews.author: KAustin

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my two-year-old nephew and he loves it. He's very in to plains, trains, and-you guessed it-automobiles. This set is very sturdy and takes the abuse that comes from being played with by a two-year-old very well. The little figures are big enough for him to grasp and play with. He like rolling the cho-cho across the carpet. The color is very bright and true to what is shown in the picture. I like the philosophy of Green Toys and I love how fun and child-friendly they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love everything from Green Toys!
customer_reviews.text: We love everything from green toys! My two boys are tough on toys and all our green toys can handle it no problems. This train is a great addition to our collection. Aa others have said the cars do not stay connected if you try and pick the whole thing up but I still think it's a solid toy. A must for any little train lover.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Fringer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 18 month old. He loves it! My 3 year old nephew also loves to play with it when he comes over. It’s colorful and durable. The little bears are too cute! A toy that can last years.
customer_reviews.author: Christina S.

customer_reviews.title: Cars come apart too easy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice toy. It's built well and the kids like it. The only problem is that the cars don't stay together well. When it's being pushed around they are constantly coming loose which is annoying. Other than that it's a quality toy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: Green Toys quality, made in the US. It was bought as a gift for a 2 year old that loves trains. He got excited when he saw it and played with it immediately. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: TravelingReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and very cute
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little train. Very well made and worth the money. My kids have several Green Toys and they love everyone. My kids play with them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: muggy

customer_reviews.title: STURDY & STRONG
customer_reviews.text: My kids TEAR STUFF UP but have never broken a Green Toy. Highly recommend the entire line of toys. We have many of their products and love them all!
customer_reviews.author: J&A

customer_reviews.title: Greentoys are always great quality and good design
customer_reviews.text: Greentoys are always great quality and good design. We first found out about them when my son played with them at the science center in town. We now have the train, boats, submarines, cars, trucks, diggers, and more and they are all great. My toddler son loves them. We bought a more expensive digger truck from another company only to find out after buying it that the digger arm is really had to move and adjust. We have never had that issue with green toys as all the parts are always easy to move and line up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Raynor

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Nice, medium sized train. It's easy to assemble but easier to unassemble. My toddler place with each piece individually because he will not allow it to stay attached.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy but too frustrating for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Love Green Toys, and most are 5 Star products in my opinion, but this one is too frustrating for a two-year-old. The cars come apart way too easily when he tries to play with it. Three stars for being sturdy, made from recycled materials, and made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: CeeGee

customer_reviews.title: Choo choo
customer_reviews.text: Its great. 2 minor complaints is it says it is a 6 piece set but they count the removable roof as a piece. Not a big deal but mildly misleading. Also the little people it comes with are useless. Would still recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! My 2 year old loves it. We tied a string to the front so he could pull it around :) he loves to use it inside and outside and it’s easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Instant Favorite with Both Kids
customer_reviews.text: I love green toys but this train has been an even bigger hit than expected. Both my kids, 5 and 2, love it. It’s big enough to carry little people or animals around and I like it better than having to set up the whole train track all the time. We recently traveled and this was one of the few toys that made the cut for carrying with us.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: This train is really fun! There are a few teddy bears that go ...
customer_reviews.text: This train is really fun! There are a few teddy bears that go with it that can be moved around. The lid of the caboose comes off which is fun for kids to put things in. It is easy to hook and unhook the trains. My daughter also likes to use the teddy bear pilot from the helicopter with the train. It's so great they are interchangeable!
customer_reviews.author: wavrida

customer_reviews.title: Love green toys!
customer_reviews.text: I love Green Toys, they are so sturdy and made in the USA. The toys are safe and very nice looking. The collection is growing!
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: My 1.5 yr old loves this train!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this train and exploring how the different pieces go together- and what I didn’t expect was for her to also love the Bears. She just adores putting the Bears on her fingers, playing with them, putting them in the train. This is an awesome set that provides so much more entertainment than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Katatonic

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as my charity Christmas gift, it arrived very quickly and is environmentally excellent and looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: My 3 1/2 year old son loves this item.
customer_reviews.text: My son and I both love Green Toys. I popped it in the dishwasher upon receipt to disinfect. It hasn't left my son's hands for the past 24 hours. He asked if he could put it next to his bed last night. These toys are a great value, indestructible and easy to clean....also, great for the tub!
customer_reviews.author: Tony S

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy. My son loves playing with it, the colors are vibrant the construction is top quality and it resists the constant drops of my 2.5 year old. We saw it at a store and my son was drawn to it immediately I distracted him to not buy it, but he noticed when we got home and kept asking me to go back and get it, for 2 days... (first toy he does this for) so I ordered it from Amazon at a better price. He gasped when he opened the package. :)
customer_reviews.author: BHonest

customer_reviews.title: Nice train, but comes apart easily
customer_reviews.text: In general, the train is nice and sturdy. However, the pegs that connect the cars together are not long enough for the train to go over small transitions in surface like from a rug to hardwood floor. Frustrating for mom and kid, alike.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Will last for years to come
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this train! I have several of the "Green Toys" and most seem to be a little bulky, but this train is a great size. I bought it for a 10 month old (it clearly states that the train is for older children), I'm tired of buying things for children that they use for 3 months and then grow out of. He likes it but only plays with one train car at a time. In my opinion it is a great toy that he will play with for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: QOTN

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Environmentally friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful toy. My son loves playing with it. It is super durable and my son has fun connecting the different sections.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved by My Toddler Train Enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year-old loves this train. The bears got lost pretty much the first week, but he doesn't seem to care. He has other little toy people who drive it around and ride in the cars. He's had it for six months now and he hasn't broken it yet, so it's pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: methylethel

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of this and I LOVE Green Toys ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this and I LOVE Green Toys products (we have a lot of them at our house!), but this one in particular is difficult for my 2.5 year old son. The train doesn't "latch" together tightly, so when ever he goes to play with it, it immediately comes apart. Right now he is just playing with some of the pieces separately, but I think the product would have been perfect if they would have made it so the train latched together more tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Toy from Green Toys
customer_reviews.text: Darling train, well made of recycled materials, and a big hit with my great nephew on Christmas Eve. I've purchased several Green Toys over the past few years for relatives and the kids love them. Well done, Green Toys - you need a larger variety so I don't run out of options to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: nom de guerre

customer_reviews.title: Everything Green Toys makes is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Everything this company makes is amazing! I love that the toys can be bath toys or not, are made from recycled material, and are big for the price, especially if you buy them on sale. Everything Green Toys makes is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Another FANTASTIC  toy from green toys
customer_reviews.text: Another FANTASTIC toy from green toys. I have 3 boys, and they are all rough on toys, all of our green toys have withstood all the abuse. Even the ones we leave outside look great
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Goettl

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy toy  as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for 15 month grandson. Well made, sturdy and strong enough for rough play, getting thrown around and hard knocking/crashing. Will be durability. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CBeh

customer_reviews.title: fantastic toy-well worth $16 sale price
customer_reviews.text: Solid, few pieces, great for motor skills as pieces go together well for 34 month old
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: We've been impressed with all of the Green Toys products we've owned. Our 2 year old loves trains and this is a great addition to his collection. Yes it's just a plastic toy, but it's a very thick, durable and well designed plastic toy! Everything is snapped together in a way that you don't see exposed connectors or screws. It's a solid piece that will last a long time. The fact that it's made with recycled product is just a nice bonus, rather than the only thing it has going for it.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this train. It goes from house to the pool to the tub and back to the tub again and it doesn’t have anywhere for mold to hide!! Love the Green Toys!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, cute, colorful and made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Another great set from Green Toys! This is our fourth or fifth item we've purchased and are always happy with the quality, and more importantly, the child we purchase these for loves them. We gave her a planting set she loves to use in the garden with mom, a construction truck, and I think an elephant or sub (can't remember) but she really loves them all. Nice sturdy toys that don't feel flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie H

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Imaginative Playtime
customer_reviews.text: This company is just Amazing. I got this for my grandson, and it's a big hit. He absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Keen

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product, almost indestructible by the kids
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a three-year-old patient of mine who absolutely loved it! He would not put it down and he was able to expand his imaginative play with use of it
customer_reviews.author: Sara Stern

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little hands
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old son loves his new train set! Very sturdy and durable!
customer_reviews.author: LuvAmazon18

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this train set. I didn't think I would like it for my son all that much, but I LOVE it! The thing I love most about it is that it is made from food grade plastic and contains no BPA or PVC. Now that I have a Green Toys product, I will definitely be buying more and recommending them to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: HappyMama89

customer_reviews.title: A great toy
customer_reviews.text: Got here fast. Seems sturdy, should last for years and most importantly my kids LOVE it!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: SKY

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great size for imaginative play.
customer_reviews.text: Great train, made in USA, sturdy, perfect size, not too large, but big enough to put in some toy animals or figures! Roof lifts off caboose and very easy to connect cars and they stay connected during play. Grandkids love it, great for imaginative play.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Gal

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and yes the pieces do come apart but my 2 year old easily puts it together with out frustration. Best part he loves it. And one day it's in the sand box, on day at the beach, one day he's throwing it down stairs. He even sleeps with it. And you just put it on the top shelf of the dishwasher and viola like new. Durable and perfectly designed for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a toy but also to use for my sons train cupcake cake and it worked perfectly. It’s sturdy and the wheels work great. My son loves his train.
customer_reviews.author: Blitzfire

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: This train is sturdy and well made like all Green toys products. Love the colors and that it comes with two train conductors. I hope Green toys comes out with more train cars to hook on to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nicely designed and built!
customer_reviews.text: This train set is adorable! My son loves it! This is not the small, cheap kind. It is easy to grip for small hands. I like that it is easy to clean- the instructions stated that the train is dishwasher safe! Wohoho!!! Would definitely buy it again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy family

customer_reviews.title: Good quality toy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. It's well made and durable. It should last a long time. Seems like a toy that could get passed down from one generation to the next.
customer_reviews.author: Jkaymr

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I have buy many toys of this brand! My sons and daughters are all like them, they are so good quality and so cheaper when have discount, so worth to buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Puccio

customer_reviews.title: Best bargin
customer_reviews.text: These sell for 60.00 at a gift shop in kansas city depot, nice toys
customer_reviews.author: Blklabmad

customer_reviews.title: Cute train!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute train. It's built tough and my 2 year old grandson loves it. The only downside is that the train pieces come unattached from each other easily, he is constantly having to reattach them. He still has fun with the train though
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mefford

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple and sturdy train toy
customer_reviews.text: Made out of very tough recycled plastic. It is not really meant as a bath toy but our toddler plays with it in the shower and it has held up without issue.
customer_reviews.author: B. Avery

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a gift I was shocked to know the item felt very solid and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Jessy Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my great grandson, he's four and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn't stay connected well
customer_reviews.text: Love Green Toys- we own several but the only dislike is the train cars don't stay attached very well at all. My son kept getting frustrated that they'd immediately come apart so I had to ziptie them together.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: It is OK
customer_reviews.text: I truly want to like this but it just not made well. The train roof keep coming off when my son plays them. The kaboos would unlatch when he pulls the engine. He gets bored after awhile. It is probably not meant for an active toddlers. Perhaps great for sandbox.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: This train is hands down worth every single penny. Durable, easy for toddler finger to link train together, no sharp edges. The top comes off and fits on other part of train. You will not be disappointed and neither with your child.
customer_reviews.author: NanaOf4

customer_reviews.title: Cute train
customer_reviews.text: My grandson likes these. However, he gets frustrated (and so do I, lol) because the connections for attaching each car to the other are very loose and they fall off almost instantly when you're moving the train. You can't really turn the train because all of the cars fall off but if you're just moving it in a straight line I suppose they would stay connected.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Best toys made!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our 2 year old grandson and his 2 year old cousin for Christmas. I know how well these toys are made, as we've already bought 3 of their trucks, 2 of their airplanes, and their ferry boat. Our little grandson absolutely loves the trucks and carries his favorite one everywhere he goes. He's also a huge fan of 'ChooChoos', so I'm sure he'll love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: Choo...Choo...Choose.
customer_reviews.text: Bright colors! Great green product. Perfect for a first train. Baby enjoys holding it. I often hide his favorite small toys in the passenger car as a little surprise when he pulls off the roof. I have put the little people away for now...not sure if they're really a choking hazard, but it made me feel better about it. I'll pull them back out when he's older.
customer_reviews.author: Arixht

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Fun. Fun. Fun. Great toy train for inside or outside. Sturdy. Just add imagination to make this train toy a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality toy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Green toys are well made and have a great purpose! They are also practically indistructable, we’ve owned a few green toys and are made to last. This train set is a great buy for the money. Came as pictured and larger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: utefan

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully you have a different experience
customer_reviews.text: Good product, son doesn't play with it so kind of a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great toys!
customer_reviews.text: Love green toys! Made of great quality, easy to clean and best of all they’re made from recycled milk jugs!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Duquette

customer_reviews.title: Good toy for 18month -3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Pros- very cute and well made Indestructible like all green toys .. My 26 month old is loading his small animal figures in it and having fun Con- the cars disconnect way too easily and it's a little frustrating .. I wish they had made a hook or something so they would stay together better..
customer_reviews.author: ansgh84

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Green Toys
customer_reviews.text: The Green Toys brand always delivers! Easy to clean, cute, sturdy, fun. Wheels move well, top of caboose is removable, comes with 2 adorable figures. Good for imaginative play!
customer_reviews.author: Laurence J.

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with Green Toys brand toys!
customer_reviews.text: This is far from our first Green Toys brand toy, but it's a wonderful brand that I go back to without hesitation! This train is a great size for any kid, and is fun because it has places to put things. My son loves putting blocks, cars, Little People, and the two bears that came with it in the train cars and engine. Sturdy, incredibly well-made, and eco-conscious.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Bilodeau (Musings of Madjy)

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My 2 y/o grandson can lean on it and push it around. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: kelly k

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is BPA free and toxin free. Have bought from Green Toys before and will continue to buy from them in the future! I also got this when it was a daily deal so I got it much cheaper than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Son loves his train
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my three year old son and he loves it. It is a great toy for imaginative play. I will be buying more Green toys.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son loves playing with it
customer_reviews.text: My toddler couldn't stop playing with the train. He even brought it to the dinner table and into his bed at night. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I nice and inexpensive toy
customer_reviews.text: A great toy for a little one that likes trains. Nicely built, with three different parts and two tiny "bear" conductors.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My Trainlovers Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old son has so many trains but this one is still his favorite. He just loves it and plays with it every day. He loves to give his other toys rides around the livngroom and kitchen in it. It's a great train and has held together for months of play without any wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Rupa L.

customer_reviews.title: Great green train toy.
customer_reviews.text: Another great green toy. My son loves trains so I am sure he will love it. He likes the green toys with people. My son is 3 turning 4 very soon and this will go great with the green rocket ship.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Ball

customer_reviews.title: Toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy kids love it plus it fun and safe and dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: R. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy,we got a lot of them and I like that there are recyclable
customer_reviews.author: Meloniky07

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys are great and this train is no exception
customer_reviews.text: Green Toys are great and this train is no exception! My son loves it and the little bears that go with it. You really can't go wrong with any of the Green Toys products. They're sturdy, clean up nicely (dishwasher safe), made from all recycled materials, and I love that they're made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys Train - A great toy, a great product from a great company
customer_reviews.text: I love Green Toys, probably the only toy company Made in the USA. Great price, made from recycled material & very durable. My 2 & 7yr old boys play with these toys. They have the plane, helicopter, recycled truck & this train set and I plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Miks

customer_reviews.title: Love Green Toys products
customer_reviews.text: We love Green Toy products since they are very durable and can be easily cleaned. Our son has about 8-9 different Green Toys ranging from trucks, planes, boats, and helicopters. He absolutely loves them and plays with them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Lodato

customer_reviews.title: wonderful line of toys!
customer_reviews.text: I love this train! It's green, it's fun, and my grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and stays together when played with. I’m assuming they fixed the initial problem with the train coming apart. My 2 year old can pull and push the train without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelynjazzytoes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, poor design
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, only thing hard to keep separate train cars hooked together when pulled on carpet. Should of designed so that separate cars stay together especially since its a toy for children
customer_reviews.author: soulsacrifice

product_meta.title: Green Toys Train - Blue
product_meta.description: All aboard! The Green Toys Train is pulling out of the station! This sturdy locomotive is ready to chug along from one eco-friendly adventure to the next. Made in the USA from 100% recycled plastic milk jugs that save energy and reduce greenhouse gas emissions, the brightly-colored steam engine pulls two additional cars that link together to form a long train, or easily unhook for stand-alone play. The open wagon is perfect for hauling all kinds of sustainable cargo, while the caboose features a spacious interior and removable roof. Two conductor bear figures are included with the set, encouraging open play as little engineers' imaginations lay the tracks for all sorts of creative narratives. With no metal axles or external coatings, the Green Toys Train is safe and versatile for both indoor and outdoor play, and is dishwasher safe for easy cleaning. No BPA, phthalates, or PVC. Packaged using recycled and recyclable materials and printed with soy inks.
feature_bullets: No BPA, phthalates, PVC, or external coatings
